message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. It's a rare opportunity to get a great deal on a product worth $125 to you. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you at a discount. It's a one-time offer, so what do you say?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I believe in your confidence and am willing to take this rare opportunity. I'm excited to receive the product and hope it meets my expectations.

This one is from the same batch as the previous one, and I'm confident it will meet your expectations as well. I'm willing to sell it to you at the same price, but I need to let you know that I've had some interest from other buyers, so it's not a guarantee that I'll have another one available if you pass on this opportunity.
Absolutely, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase another product from you. Given the value it holds for me, I'm more than willing to make this purchase again.

I'm still willing to sell it to you for $100, but I want to make it clear that it might not meet your expectations.
